text: Hauna (Muhammad (SAW)) kuona here vanyengedzi avo vanotaura kune madzikoma avo, avo vasingatendi kubva mune vanhu veBhuku (vachiti): “(Tinopika naAllah!) Kana imi mukadzingwa, zvirokwazvo tichaenda pamwe nemi, uye hatizomboteereri kana ani zvake pamusoro penyu; uye kana mukarwiswa, zvirokwazvo tichakubetserai.” Asi Allah vanopupura kuti zvirokwazvo vanyepi
